Description

A class to represent the database

Class to represent an Event

An adapter that connects a ListView of events with an ArrayList of events.
EventPhoto
 
EventUnitTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).

Interface for a class that listens to GoToEvent requests
MainActivity
 
ModelBase<V extends TView<ModelBase<?>>>
Class to use as a model in the MVC design pattern

Helper class that extends FileProvider to help with sharing images.

Fragment for selecting time
TimePickerFragment.TimePickerDialogListener
Interface to be implemented by parent activity/fragment
TView<M>
Interface for Views to inherit from so that they can be updated by a model.
